td.content: s:pt presents with 13 months history of critical multiple reddish skin nodules at the left side of the neck. she is a 80 yr old white female retired. she consumes 2 drinks per night denies any smoking o:Height 157 cm, Weight 71.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, CE CT Abdomen shows 60 x 55 mm round heterogenous mass with necrotic zones in the region of porta liver and a volume defect in the head of pancrease, FNA Pancreas, Microscopic Observation showed a poorly differentiated pseudopapillary tumor of the pancrease with reactive hyperplasia of the regional lymph nodes a:Pancreatic Cancer p:administered gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, performed CE CT Abdomen, FNA Pancreas, Microscopic Observation, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
